name: df-ltp
body: |- wceq(cltp, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cnp), wcel(cv(s1), cnp)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
comment: Define ordering on positive reals. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-3.2 of [Gleason] p. 122. (Contributed by NM, 14-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
